turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a a tall black decaffeinated coffee with brown sugar from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, let me order that for you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: just to confirm, you said you wanted a tall black decaf coffee with brown sugar?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, it will be ready for pickup at Starbucks, westlake shopping center, daly city, ca in 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Wow, thank you very much. You really make my day.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you.
